intro: Psychotria kaduana var. pubiflora, commonly known as the velvet psychotria, is a species native to tropical regions of South America. It is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family, characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. The leaves and flowers contain various alkaloids, which have been studied for their potential medicinal properties.
